subject: Religion & Spirituality
subcategory: Sacred Texts That Shaped the World
title: The Quran and Science: A Complex Relationship
description: A 60-second lesson on The Quran and Science: A Complex Relationship.

hook.text: Some Muslims claim the Quran predicted modern science. Critics say they're reading modern knowledge into old metaphors.

buildup.text: Verses about expanding heavens and embryo stages are cited as proof of divine scientific knowledge in the 7th century.

discovery.text: The 'scientific miracles' movement grew in the 1980s. It aimed to prove the Quran's divine origin through science.

twist.text: Many Muslim scholars reject this approach. They say the Quran is spiritual guidance, not a science textbook.

climax.text: Using science to prove scripture is risky. Science changes; scripture doesn't. Tying them together can backfire.

punchline.text: The Quran isn't a science book. Tying faith to science can backfire badly.

quiz.question: What is the 'scientific miracles' movement in Islam?
options: The claim that the Quran contains scientific predictions ahead of its time
